function searchForZion() {
       // humanTerritories is an array of location objects,
       for (let location in humanTerritories) {
           if (location.name === "Zion") {
               return true;
           }
       }
   }
   
   function destroyZion() {
       // humanSurvivors is an array of people living in Zion,
       while (humanSurvivors.length > 0) {
           humanSurvivors.pop();
       }
       return true;
   }
   
   function controlHumans() {
       while (!zionDefeated) {
           let isZionFound = searchForZion();
       }
       if (isZionFound) {
           zionDefeated = destroyZion();
       }
   }
   
   let zionDefeated = false;
   
   // PROGRAM IS THE CODE NAME FOR AGENT SMITH (FROM THE PREVIOUS DOCUMENT),
   program.directive = controlHumans;
   program.directive();
